body.name: RAPIQUE Bluetooth Wireless Mouse - (BT1/BT2+USB Receiver) Tri-Device Compatibility for PC, Laptop, Computer, MacBook, Tablet (Black and Yellow)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 19 mins
features: 🎉INNOVATIVE MECHA STYLE DESIGN - Experience the unique yellow and black combination that will captivate your senses, Meticulously crafted with utmost precision, this wireless mouse is a visual delight and makes for a perfect gift choice.

🎉SEAMLESS CONTROL OF 3 DEVICES - Seamlessly switch between three devices with our dual Bluetooth 5.1 modes and wireless 2.4G technology. A simple click of the mode switch button located at the bottom of the mouse allows you to effortlessly transition from desktop to tablet, laptop to Macbook, iPad, and more. The green, blue, and red indication lights represent BT1, BT2, and 2.4G USB respectively, ensuring easy and convenient device connectivity.

🎉RECHARGEABLE & AUTO SLEEP FUNCTION - Say goodbye to battery replacements with our convenient USB to Type-C cable charging. Fast and stable charging ensures you are always powered up. Embrace energy efficiency and environmental friendliness. After 1.5 minutes of inactivity, the mouse automatically enters sleep mode to conserve power. A simple click of any button or movement of the mouse wakes it up instantly.

🎉SILENT CLICK & HIGH RESPONSIVENESS - No more worries about disturbing others with noisy clicks. Our noiseless mouse reduces noise by up to 90%, providing a silent working environment. With 3 adjustable DPI settings (800, 1200, and 1600), enjoy precise and sensitive cursor movement for enhanced productivity.

🎉COMFORTABLE & DURABLE DESIGN - Designed for ergonomic comfort, this mouse features an elegant profile that fits perfectly in your hand. With 6 buttons, including 2 convenient forward and backward buttons on the left side, it caters to both work and gaming needs. Tested for durability with over 5 million clicks, this mouse ensures long-term stability.

🎉WIDE COMPATIBILITY - Compatible with Windows 8/10/11, Android, and Mac OS systems via Bluetooth 5.1. For devices without Bluetooth capability, simply insert the 2.4G USB receiver for seamless connectivity. Works with desktops, laptops, PCs, Macbooks, Chromebooks, and Surface Pro, providing versatility and convenience.

Note: 1. Bluetooth 5.1 supports the ios system for both iPad and iPhones, but the ios system has to be ios 14 or later version; 2. Long press the top DPI button to turn off the decorative light, and long press again to turn on it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Ergonomic Design The grip is exceptionally comfortable, and the use is more labor-saving, which makes people love it. Easy to connect and switch Next page 1 Comfortable Grip 2 Mecha Style 3 Compact Size 4 Multi-device Connection

Bluetooth mode ＆ 2.4G USB Receiver Soft and Quiet Clicking We are proud to introduce a new level of quiet operation, allowing you to experience an exceptional noise-free workflow. Whether in a bustling office, a cozy café, or during late-night work sessions, our silent click technology eliminates the sound of button clicks, ensuring you won't disturb others while they rest or work.

USB-C Fast Charging Rechargeable Crodless Mouse Say goodbye to the hassle of constantly replacing batteries and embrace the ease of simply plugging in and charging your mouse whenever needed. With the USB-C port, you can enjoy fast charging and a reliable power source that ensures uninterrupted productivity. No more worries about running out of battery at crucial moments. The charging indicator light is blue. If it stays on, it means charging, and if it goes off, it means it is fully charged. The mouse comes with a USB-C charging cable.

Wireless mouse for multi-device users Automatic sleep to save power It will enter sleep mode after 1.5 minutes of inactivity for power saving, and wake it up by clicking any button or moving the mouse.

3 Adjustable DPI Short press click the DPI button to switch, 800-1200-1600 3-level DPI meets the needs of work and games.Long press the DPI button to turn off the decorative light to save power, and long press to turn it on again. The colorful decorative light helps you find it easier in the dark. Six-Button Design Super sleek design, the curve of the wireless mouse for a laptop fits the relaxed palm just right. The Unique lines and three-dimensional texture surface is anti-fingerprint and so comfortable to hold in hand.Six-button design with forward and back buttons makes browsing the web more convenient.

Broadly Compatible Bluetooth Support: Windows 8/ window 10/window 11/ChromeOS/ Android/ Mac iOS 11 and above systems. Note: Bluetooth not available for Win7/XP.2.4G USB Receiver Support: All devices with USB interface.It Fits desktops, laptops, PC, Macbooks, Tablets, Chromebook, and Surface pro. Ultra portable The RAPIQUE R110 compact mouse is very convenient to carry and slips into your laptop case, handbag, or pocket for versatile on-the-go productivity.The two connection modes (Bluetooth＆ Nano Receiver) are suitable for various scenarios, and easy be switched to meet your maximum needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I impulsively purchased this mouse after my previous one's scrolling wheel broke. Surprisingly, it has exceeded my expectations, serving me well for work, school, and gaming. Not only does it boast an appealing design, but it also offers excellent functionality, featuring quiet clicking and smooth scrolling. The rechargeable battery lasts for weeks, and I'm surprised it hasn't garnered more reviews given its affordability and quality. I would buy it again in a heartbeat. Don’t miss this opportunity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome wireless mouse
reviews.reviewText: So far I am loving this mouse.Great price, awesome color, feels comfy in my rather large hand. Nice surface feel, moves quite smoothly, very respinsive. Top buttons have a nice click, and not a lot pressure needed to depress them.Wheel has a nice sound, feel and movement. The button behind the wheel allows you to set the dpi to three different settings.Has a bright RGB light on the mouse. This is definitely a love or hate thing. I am not a fan, but not a deal breaker.I love that you can sync via bluetooth (actually have two BT connections) no dongle, or 2.4gHz with dongle. Both wireless options connect easily, had some issues at first with dropping BT connection, but for whatever reason worked itself out.Two more buttons on the side, and is rechargeable via USB-C cable. The bonus is, unlike an Apple mouse, you can still use the mouse while charging. Though I have not had it drop out while using it, I have gone well over a week of daily use, before I just connected it to charge it up.Going to be honest, this is a heck a of a fun mouse, with a a really nice set of specs. For a silly low price.For most people, this a very cool, useful mouse. It feels good in the hand, it is really light, but not terribly so.I did not use this for gaming, but suspect for most, but would work fine.It is not $100 quality, but also not cheap, cheap either.So in summary, you get a lot of nice options, in a good looking, nice feeling mouse. Definitely worth the investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is awesome. The design is great, very ergonomic, light and RECHARGEABLE. The Bluetooth connection is super easy to setup. Definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Functional
reviews.reviewText: I don't love the silent click and I wish it was a little heavier (personal preference). But so far it was easy to connect and has worked well for my purposed. I love the colors (I work on a lot of dark surfaces or from couches and I've misplaced mice in the past because they've camouflaged - I don't have to worry about that with this mouse - EVEN when the cute LEDs are off).I don't know how to program the side buttons and nothing in the manual explains them. I spent 25 minutes digging through my computer settings to try and figure it out, but I had no luck.So far, great buy for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice mouse. Perfect for me.
reviews.reviewText: Small and comfortable in my kids hands and my own as well. Silent clicking but with tactile feedback. Glides smoothly and color changing LED is a nice touch. It connected immediately with 2.4ghz USB dongle. Haven't really tried bluetooth connection but 2.4 has less lag anyway. It could be a great gaming mouse but I haven't figured out how to assign actions to the side buttons in Windows. Physically similar to Logitech Lightspeed but less than half the price. So far it has lasted a week on a charge without ever turning it off. I replaced a generic corded mouse, but with a slide out keyboard tray, the cord kept catching on things. Problem solved with this sweet cordless mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick connect, and no battery's
reviews.reviewText: Right now I'm still in testing faze, but love the color,my wife's favorite color. Fits my hands, left or right ✅️ very responsive 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent mouse! 3x the value of Logitech MX Anywhere mouse
reviews.reviewText: Just purchased this mouse after being a long time logitech customer. My last MX 3 mouse died after 2 years. Went to order and they want $70! (Jan2024). 3 to 4 times the cost of other BT mice. This model looks better and works every bit as well for under $20.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Truly excellent mouse. Ergonomic and lightweight. Since I teach online and generate online content, I also love the silent clicking. You don't need the USB adaptor to connect it to Bluetooth on a Mac computer. Just set it to BT and add the device on the Mac and it will work flawlessly.
